完存: (かんそん) - existing in full; remaining completely
完完: (かんかん) - (often at end of document)  confirmed as completed; everything must go (e.g. in a sale)
完封: (かんぷう) - complete blockade (seal); baseball shutout
完徹: (かんてつ) - (from 完全な徹夜) all nighter; sleepless night
完成度: (かんせいど) - degree of perfection; level of completion; degree of completion
完投: (かんとう) - going the whole distance; pitching a whole game
完敗: (かんぱい) - complete defeat/utter defeat/annihilation; to be completely defeated/to be beaten hollow
完母: (かんぼ) - feeding an infant solely with breast milk (i.e. no formula)
完熟: (かんじゅく) - completely ripe; completely mature
完納: (かんのう) - full payment or delivery
完結編: (かんけつへん) - concluding episode of a series; concluding volume (part) (e.g. of novel)
完膚なきまで: (かんぷなきまで) - completely; thoroughly; horribly; without exception; until there's no untouched (undamaged) part
完膚無きまで: (かんぷなきまで) - completely; thoroughly; horribly; without exception; until there's no untouched (undamaged) part
完膚無き迄: (かんぷなきまで) - completely; thoroughly; horribly; without exception; until there's no untouched (undamaged) part
完走: (かんそう) - running the race; staying the course
完遂: (かんつい) - accomplishing; accomplishment; carrying out; carrying through; bringing to a successful conclusion
完食: (かんしょく) - eating everything (on one's plate, etc.)
完飲: (かんいん) - drinking everything (in one's glass, etc.)
宏大: (こうだい) - huge; very large; vast; extensive; magnificent; grand
宏池会: (こうちかい) - Kouchikai (political faction of the LDP)
宏濶: (こうかつ) - spaciousness; extensiveness; expansiveness; vastness
宏闊: (こうかつ) - spaciousness; extensiveness; expansiveness; vastness
宗主国: (そうしゅこく) - suzerain state; state that controls another in international affairs, but allows it domestic sovereignty
宗伯: (そうはく) - Minister of Rites (Zhou-dynasty China)
宗太鰹: (ソウダガツオ) - frigate tuna (Auxis spp.)
宗太鰹属: (そうだがつおぞく) - Auxis (genus of tuna)
宗学: (しゅうがく) - study of religious doctrine
宗廟: (そうびょう) - ancestral shrine (temple); mausoleum (of one's ancestors); Imperial mausoleum
宗教: (shuukyou) - religião, filiação religiosa, crença, fé, credo; atividade religiosa
宗教々育: (しゅうきょうきょういく) - religious education
宗教上: (しゅうきょうじょう) - religious; spiritual
宗教劇: (しゅうきょうげき) - religious drama; miracle play
宗教勧誘員: (しゅうきょうかんゆういん) - door-to-door solicitor; door-to-door preacher
宗教史: (しゅうきょうし) - religious history; history of religion
宗教右派: (しゅうきょううは) - (the) religious right
宗教哲学: (しゅうきょうてつがく) - philosophy of religion
宗教問題: (しゅうきょうもんだい) - religious issue; religious problem; religious question
宗教団体: (しゅうきょうだんたい) - religious group
宗教学: (しゅうきょうがく) - the study or science of religion; religious studies
宗教対立: (しゅうきょうたいりつ) - religious opposition; religious conflict; religious antagonism
宗教差別: (しゅうきょうさべつ) - religious discrimination
宗教戦争: (しゅうきょうせんそう) - religious war
宗教改革: (しゅうきょうかいかく) - the Reformation
宗教教育: (しゅうきょうきょういく) - religious education
宗教法: (しゅうきょうほう) - religious law
宗教法人: (しゅうきょうほうじん) - religious organization; religious organisation
宗教熱: (しゅうきょうねつ) - religious fervour; religious enthusiasm
宗教画: (しゅうきょうが) - religious painting or picture
宗教的: (しゅうきょうてき) - religious; spiritual
宗教的独立性: (しゅうきょうてきどくりつせい) - religious independence
宗教色: (しゅうきょうしょく) - religious atmosphere
宗教芸術: (しゅうきょうげいじゅつ) - sacred art; religious art
宗教裁判: (しゅうきょうさいばん) - the Inquisition
宗教都市: (しゅうきょうとし) - holy city; city developed around a church, temple, shrine, etc. (e.g. Ise, Mecca, Vatican)
宗教音楽: (しゅうきょうおんがく) - religious music
宗教騎士団: (しゅうきょうきしだん) - military order
宗族: (そうぞく) - one's family or clan
宗旨: (しゅうし) - tenets (doctrines) of a religious sect; (religious) sect
宗法: (そうほう) - (historical) regulations governing Chinese religious observances and social order
宗義: (しゅうぎ) - denominational doctrine; doctrine of a sect
宗論: (しゅうろん) - doctrinal dispute (within or between religious schools)
